mapper.select: SELECT c.course_id, c.user_id, c.course_code, c.classroom, c.type, c.time, c.title, c.credit, c.max_std, c.rem_std, c.status, c.grade, s.semester_id, s.year, s.semester, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM enrollment e WHERE e.course_id = c.course_id) AS courseStudent FROM course c JOIN semester s ON s.semester_id = c.semester_id WHERE c.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY c.course_id DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE course SET classroom = #{classroom}, type = #{type}, time = #{time}, title = #{title}, credit = #{credit}, week_plan = #{weekPlan}, text_book = #{textBook}, goal = #{goal}, max_std = #{maxStd}, grade = #{grade} WHERE course_id = #{courseId}
